Authors:
K. P. Deepna Latha, K. N. Anil Raj, Shahina Amabalath
Sharafudheen, P. Manimohan
Title: Clitocybula sulcataa new species from India
Keywords:
Agaricales, Basidiomycota, Marasmiaceae, Clitocybula,
phylogeny, taxonomy
Abstract:
Clitocybula sulcata sp. nov. is described from Kerala
State, India. Comprehensive description, photographs, and comparisons
with phenetically similar species are provided. Molecular phylogenetic
analyses based on nrITS-rDNA sequences coupled with morphology confirmed
the placement of this species in Clitocybula. The present study forms
the first report of this genus from Kerala.
